textBeforeTable: Table of Contents Designed to meet the needs of users from a broad range of experience levels, MICROSOFT EXPRESSION WEB 3: ILLUSTRATED COMPLETE equips you with Expression Web basics--and well beyond--using the signature Illustrated two-page spread format. Covering the nuts and bolts, new cutting-edge features, and everything in between, the text presents each skill on a succinct, easy-to-understand, two-page spread--making for focused and thorough instruction.
